element-citation.article-title: Electron transfer in condensed media: failure of the Born-Oppenheimer and Franck-Condon approximations, collective phenomena and detailed balance relationship
element-citation.comment: [Proc. 4th World Congr. Theor. Oriented Chemists – WATOC ’96, Jerusalem, Israel, 7–12 July 1996 (Elsevier, Amsterdam, 1996)]
